title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 January 2015 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> sdumitriu: hi, not sure it's the best moment since we're preparing for 6.4RC1 ;) (could have been better to wait for 7.0 work). I hope you're sure of yourself :)  
00:47 <vmassol> OTOH it's good to see you active :)  
00:48 <sdumitriu> Hi vmassol  
00:49 <sdumitriu> I think it's a safe change  
00:49 <vmassol> (RC1 release is planned for Monday fyi)  
00:49 <vmassol> ok  
00:49 <sdumitriu> How are you? Feeling better?  
00:50 <vmassol> it's ok I've accepted the situation  
00:50 <vmassol> and I'm living with it  
00:50 <vmassol> (thanks for asking)  
00:51 <vmassol> (It won't improve)  
00:52 <sdumitriu> Sorry to hear that  
00:52 <sdumitriu> It's just one ear, right?  
00:52 <vmassol> yeah but don't worry, there's worse in life :)  
00:52 <vmassol> yes only one ear  
00:53 <vmassol> the other one is precious now ;)  
00:53 <vmassol> all is ok on your side?  
00:53 <vmassol> still in Canada?  
00:54 <sdumitriu> Yes  
00:59 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I'd be curious to know what you think of the work done in XWiki 6.x. Think it's going in the right direction? I sent a mail about what people would like to see in XWiki 7.x. Internally at XWiki SAS we've had a brainstorming about XWiki 7.x and the XWiki 7.0 release. I need to send proposal mails in the coming days  
01:00 <sdumitriu> I'm waiting to see Boostrap fully working  
01:00 <sdumitriu> That's something we'd like in PhenoTips as well  
01:00 <vmassol> you mean the flamingo skin?  
01:00 <sdumitriu> Yes  
01:01 <vmassol> it's almost there, we're finishing polishing ATM  
01:01 <sdumitriu> We've seen a few glitches in the distribution wizard on 5.4.x, I hope they're all fixed in the 6.x version  
01:01 <vmassol> there'll probably be a 6.4.1 after 6.4  
01:01 <vmassol> possibly yes  
01:03 <vmassol> ok bed time here… nn nice to talk to you, take care  
01:04 <sdumitriu> You too, bye  
01:04 <vmassol> has quit
